explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the concept of technological complexity (TC) and its application to consumer behavior in the context of high value-added foodstuffs, specifically cured ham and cured sausage. It uses a mixed-effects multi-nomial logistic regression model for analysis, which is a statistical method rather than a machine learning or deep learning technique. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or specific algorithms and models are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
